title: 急求为何chestcommands玩家用牌子就可以打开，但是用物品右键无法打开，OP就可以
author: Miracles_xiu

replies.author: 1451599023zhao
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 权限组 chestcommands.item.main-menu.yml
main-menu.yml这里是你要打开的菜单名字不推荐中文不行的话就用这个名字

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 打开权限给了没有 chestcommands.command.open

replies.author: Miracles_xiu
replies.txt_content:
Miracles_xiu 发表于 2015-8-16 18:01
给过了，
普通玩家用牌子就可以打开，用钟表就打不开，而OP用钟表打得开
